mdRecord.dcterms:title: West Virginia: The Rand-McNally Vest pocket map of West Virginia, showing all counties, cities, towns, railways, lakes, rivers, etc
Rand-McNally Vest pocket map of West Virginia
Vest pocket map of West Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rand McNally and Company. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 54 x 71 cm. 15 x 7 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Map has title "West Virginia" with "Rand, McNally & Co.'s New business atlas map of Virginia and West Virginia" in small type below the bar scale. [original]
Inset: Northern portion of West Virginia on same scale. [original]
List of West Virginia railroads overprinted in red. [original]
Sheet includes portions of adjoining states, but only West Virginia is colored. [original]
Index to chief cities printed in left margin, with index to counties, creeks, mountains, rivers and towns and a list of West Virginia electric lines printed on verso. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Folded into original brown paper covers. With marginal tears. Contains manuscript annotations. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Cover is glued to verso of the map, obscuring a portion of the index text. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Railroads--West Virginia--Maps
Electric lines--West Virginia
West Virginia--Maps
